00044 typedef struct {
00045     unsigned short  imagic;     /* stuff saved on disk . . */
00046     unsigned short  type;
00047     unsigned short  dim;
00048     unsigned short  xsize;
00049     unsigned short  ysize;
00050     unsigned short  zsize;
00051     unsigned int    min;
00052     unsigned int    max;
00053     unsigned int    wastebytes; 
00054     char        name[80];
00055     unsigned int    colormap;
00056 
00057     int         file;       /* stuff used in core only */
00058     unsigned short  flags;
00059     short       dorev;
00060     short       x;
00061     short       y;
00062     short       z;
00063     short       cnt;
00064     unsigned short  *ptr;
00065     unsigned short  *base;
00066     unsigned short  *tmpbuf;
00067     unsigned int    offset;
00068     unsigned int    rleend;     /* for rle images */
00069     unsigned int    *rowstart;  /* for rle images */
00070     int     *rowsize;   /* for rle images */
00071 } IMAGE;

00073 #define RINTLUM (79)
00074 #define GINTLUM (156)
00075 #define BINTLUM (21)
00076 
00077 #define ILUM(r,g,b) ((int)(RINTLUM*(r)+GINTLUM*(g)+BINTLUM*(b))>>8)
00078 
00079 #define OFFSET_R    0   /* this is byte order dependent */
00080 #define OFFSET_G    1
00081 #define OFFSET_B    2
00082 #define OFFSET_A    3
00083 
00084 #define CHANOFFSET(z)   (3-(z)) /* this is byte order dependent */
00085 
00086 #define TYPEMASK        0xff00
00087 #define BPPMASK         0x00ff
00088 #define ITYPE_VERBATIM      0x0000
00089 #define ITYPE_RLE       0x0100
00090 #define ISRLE(type)     (((type) & 0xff00) == ITYPE_RLE)
00091 #define ISVERBATIM(type)    (((type) & 0xff00) == ITYPE_VERBATIM)
00092 #define BPP(type)       ((type) & BPPMASK)
00093 #define RLE(bpp)        (ITYPE_RLE | (bpp))
00094 #define VERBATIM(bpp)       (ITYPE_VERBATIM | (bpp))
00095 #define IBUFSIZE(pixels)    ((pixels+(pixels>>6))<<2)
00096 #define RLE_NOP         0x00

00116 /*
00117  *  byte order independent read/write of shorts and ints.
00118  *
00119  */
00120 
00121 static uchar * file_data;
00122 static int file_offset;
00123 
00124 static unsigned short getshort(FILE *inf)
00125 {
00126     unsigned char * buf;
00127     (void)inf; /* unused */
00128 
00129     buf = file_data + file_offset;
00130     file_offset += 2;
00131     
00132     return (buf[0]<<8)+(buf[1]<<0);
00133 }
00134 
00135 static unsigned int getlong(FILE *inf)
00136 {
00137     unsigned char * buf;
00138     (void)inf; /* unused */
00139     
00140     buf = file_data + file_offset;
00141     file_offset += 4;
00142     
00143     return (buf[0]<<24)+(buf[1]<<16)+(buf[2]<<8)+(buf[3]<<0);
00144 }
00145 
00146 static void putshort(FILE *outf, unsigned short val)
00147 {
00148     unsigned char buf[2];
00149 
00150     buf[0] = (val>>8);
00151     buf[1] = (val>>0);
00152     fwrite(buf,2,1,outf);
00153 }
00154 
00155 static int putlong(FILE *outf, unsigned int val)
00156 {
00157     unsigned char buf[4];
00158 
00159     buf[0] = (val>>24);
00160     buf[1] = (val>>16);
00161     buf[2] = (val>>8);
00162     buf[3] = (val>>0);
00163     return fwrite(buf,4,1,outf);
00164 }
00165 
00166 static void readheader(FILE *inf, IMAGE *image)
00167 {
00168     memset(image, 0, sizeof(IMAGE));
00169     image->imagic = getshort(inf);
00170     image->type = getshort(inf);
00171     image->dim = getshort(inf);
00172     image->xsize = getshort(inf);
00173     image->ysize = getshort(inf);
00174     image->zsize = getshort(inf);
00175 }
00176 
00177 static int writeheader(FILE *outf, IMAGE *image)
00178 {
00179     IMAGE t= {0};
00180 
00181     fwrite(&t,sizeof(IMAGE),1,outf);
00182     fseek(outf,0,SEEK_SET);
00183     putshort(outf,image->imagic);
00184     putshort(outf,image->type);
00185     putshort(outf,image->dim);
00186     putshort(outf,image->xsize);
00187     putshort(outf,image->ysize);
00188     putshort(outf,image->zsize);
00189     putlong(outf,image->min);
00190     putlong(outf,image->max);
00191     putlong(outf,0);
00192     return fwrite("no name",8,1,outf);
00193 }
00194 
00195 static int writetab(FILE *outf, unsigned int *tab, int len)
00196 {
00197     int r = 0;
00198 
00199     while (len) {
00200         r = putlong(outf,*tab++);
00201         len -= 4;
00202     }
00203     return r;
00204 }
00205 
00206 static void readtab(FILE *inf, unsigned int *tab, int len)
00207 {
00208     while (len) {
00209         *tab++ = getlong(inf);
00210         len -= 4;
00211     }
00212 }

00214 static void test_endian_zbuf(struct ImBuf *ibuf)
00215 {
00216     int len;
00217     int *zval;
00218     
00219     if ( BIG_LONG(1) == 1 ) return;
00220     if (ibuf->zbuf == NULL) return;
00221     
00222     len= ibuf->x*ibuf->y;
00223     zval= ibuf->zbuf;
00224     
00225     while (len--) {
00226         zval[0]= BIG_LONG(zval[0]);
00227         zval++;
00228     }
00229 }
00230 
00231 /* from misc_util: flip the bytes from x  */
00232 #define GS(x) (((unsigned char *)(x))[0] << 8 | ((unsigned char *)(x))[1])
00233 
00234 /* this one is only def-ed once, strangely... */
00235 #define GSS(x) (((uchar *)(x))[1] << 8 | ((uchar *)(x))[0])
00236 
00237 int imb_is_a_iris(unsigned char *mem)
00238 {
00239     return ((GS(mem) == IMAGIC) || (GSS(mem) == IMAGIC));
00240 }
00241 
00242 /*
00243  *  longimagedata - 
00244  *      read in a B/W RGB or RGBA iris image file and return a 
00245  *  pointer to an array of ints.
00246  *
00247  */
00248 
00249 struct ImBuf *imb_loadiris(unsigned char *mem, size_t size, int flags)
00250 {
00251     unsigned int *base, *lptr = NULL;
00252     float *fbase, *fptr = NULL;
00253     unsigned int *zbase, *zptr;
00254     unsigned char *rledat;
00255     unsigned int *starttab, *lengthtab;
00256     FILE *inf = NULL;
00257     IMAGE image;
00258     int x, y, z, tablen;
00259     int xsize, ysize, zsize;
00260     int bpp, rle, cur, badorder;
00261     ImBuf * ibuf;
00262 
00263     (void)size; /* unused */
00264     
00265     if (!imb_is_a_iris(mem)) return NULL;
00266 
00267     /*printf("new iris\n");*/
00268     
00269     file_data = mem;
00270     file_offset = 0;
00271     
00272     readheader(inf, &image);
00273     if (image.imagic != IMAGIC) {
00274         fprintf(stderr,"longimagedata: bad magic number in image file\n");
00275         return(NULL);
00276     }
00277     
00278     rle = ISRLE(image.type);
00279     bpp = BPP(image.type);
00280     if (bpp != 1 && bpp != 2) {
00281         fprintf(stderr,"longimagedata: image must have 1 or 2 byte per pix chan\n");
00282         return(NULL);
00283     }
00284     
00285     xsize = image.xsize;
00286     ysize = image.ysize;
00287     zsize = image.zsize;
00288     
00289     if (flags & IB_test) {
00290         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(image.xsize, image.ysize, 8 * image.zsize, 0);
00291         if (ibuf) ibuf->ftype = IMAGIC;
00292         return(ibuf);
00293     }
00294     
00295     if (rle) {
00296         
00297         tablen = ysize*zsize*sizeof(int);
00298         starttab = (unsigned int *)MEM_mallocN(tablen, "iris starttab");
00299         lengthtab = (unsigned int *)MEM_mallocN(tablen, "iris endtab");
00300         file_offset = 512;
00301         
00302         readtab(inf,starttab,tablen);
00303         readtab(inf,lengthtab,tablen);
00304     
00305         /* check data order */
00306         cur = 0;
00307         badorder = 0;
00308         for (y = 0; y<ysize; y++) {
00309             for (z = 0; z<zsize; z++) {
00310                 if (starttab[y+z*ysize]<cur) {
00311                     badorder = 1;
00312                     break;
00313                 }
00314                 cur = starttab[y+z*ysize];
00315             }
00316             if (badorder)
00317                 break;
00318         }
00319     
00320         if (bpp == 1) {
00321             
00322             ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(xsize, ysize, 8 * zsize, IB_rect);
00323             if (ibuf->planes > 32) ibuf->planes = 32;
00324             base = ibuf->rect;
00325             zbase = (unsigned int *)ibuf->zbuf;
00326             
00327             if (badorder) {
00328                 for (z=0; z<zsize; z++) {
00329                     lptr = base;
00330                     for (y=0; y<ysize; y++) {
00331                         file_offset = starttab[y+z*ysize];
00332                         
00333                         rledat = file_data + file_offset;
00334                         file_offset += lengthtab[y+z*ysize];
00335                         
00336                         expandrow((uchar *)lptr, rledat, 3-z);
00337                         lptr += xsize;
00338                     }
00339                 }
00340             }
00341             else {
00342                 lptr = base;
00343                 zptr = zbase;
00344                 for (y=0; y<ysize; y++) {
00345                 
00346                     for (z=0; z<zsize; z++) {
00347                         
00348                         file_offset = starttab[y+z*ysize];
00349 
00350                         rledat = file_data + file_offset;
00351                         file_offset += lengthtab[y+z*ysize];
00352                         
00353                         if (z<4) expandrow((uchar *)lptr, rledat, 3-z);
00354                         else if (z<8) expandrow((uchar *)zptr, rledat, 7-z);
00355                     }
00356                     lptr += xsize;
00357                     zptr += xsize;
00358                 }
00359             }
00360             
00361 
00362         }
00363         else {  /* bpp == 2 */
00364             
00365             ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(xsize, ysize, 32, (flags & IB_rect)|IB_rectfloat);
00366             
00367             fbase = ibuf->rect_float;
00368             
00369             if (badorder) {
00370                 for (z=0; z<zsize; z++) {
00371                     fptr = fbase;
00372                     for (y=0; y<ysize; y++) {
00373                         file_offset = starttab[y+z*ysize];
00374                         
00375                         rledat = file_data + file_offset;
00376                         file_offset += lengthtab[y+z*ysize];
00377                         
00378                         expandrow2(fptr, rledat, 3-z);
00379                         fptr += xsize * 4;
00380                     }
00381                 }
00382             }
00383             else {
00384                 fptr = fbase;
00385 
00386                 for (y=0; y<ysize; y++) {
00387                 
00388                     for (z=0; z<zsize; z++) {
00389                         
00390                         file_offset = starttab[y+z*ysize];
00391 
00392                         rledat = file_data + file_offset;
00393                         file_offset += lengthtab[y+z*ysize];
00394                         
00395                         expandrow2(fptr, rledat, 3-z);
00396                         
00397                     }
00398                     fptr += xsize * 4;
00399                 }
00400             }
00401         }
00402         
00403         MEM_freeN(starttab);
00404         MEM_freeN(lengthtab);   
00405 
00406     }
00407     else {
00408         if (bpp == 1) {
00409             
00410             ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(xsize, ysize, 8 * zsize, IB_rect);
00411             if (ibuf->planes > 32) ibuf->planes = 32;
00412 
00413             base = ibuf->rect;
00414             zbase = (unsigned int *)ibuf->zbuf;
00415             
00416             file_offset = 512;
00417             rledat = file_data + file_offset;
00418             
00419             for (z = 0; z < zsize; z++) {
00420                 
00421                 if (z<4) lptr = base;
00422                 else if (z<8) lptr= zbase;
00423                 
00424                 for (y = 0; y < ysize; y++) {
00425 
00426                     interleaverow((uchar *)lptr, rledat, 3-z, xsize);
00427                     rledat += xsize;
00428                     
00429                     lptr += xsize;
00430                 }
00431             }
00432             
00433         }
00434         else {  /* bpp == 2 */
00435             
00436             ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(xsize, ysize, 32, (flags & IB_rect)|IB_rectfloat);
00437 
00438             fbase = ibuf->rect_float;
00439 
00440             file_offset = 512;
00441             rledat = file_data + file_offset;
00442             
00443             for (z = 0; z < zsize; z++) {
00444                 
00445                 fptr = fbase;
00446                 
00447                 for (y = 0; y < ysize; y++) {
00448 
00449                     interleaverow2(fptr, rledat, 3-z, xsize);
00450                     rledat += xsize * 2;
00451                     
00452                     fptr += xsize * 4;
00453                 }
00454             }
00455             
00456         }
00457     }
00458     
00459     
00460     if (bpp == 1) {
00461         uchar * rect;
00462         
00463         if (image.zsize == 1) {
00464             rect = (uchar *) ibuf->rect;
00465             for (x = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; x > 0; x--) {
00466                 rect[0] = 255;
00467                 rect[1] = rect[2] = rect[3];
00468                 rect += 4;
00469             }
00470         }
00471         else if (image.zsize == 2) {
00472             /* grayscale with alpha */
00473             rect = (uchar *) ibuf->rect;
00474             for (x = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; x > 0; x--) {
00475                 rect[0] = rect[2];
00476                 rect[1] = rect[2] = rect[3];
00477                 rect += 4;
00478             }
00479         }
00480         else if (image.zsize == 3) {
00481             /* add alpha */
00482             rect = (uchar *) ibuf->rect;
00483             for (x = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; x > 0; x--) {
00484                 rect[0] = 255;
00485                 rect += 4;
00486             }
00487         }
00488         
00489     }
00490     else {  /* bpp == 2 */
00491         
00492         if (image.zsize == 1) {
00493             fbase = ibuf->rect_float;
00494             for (x = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; x > 0; x--) {
00495                 fbase[0] = 1;
00496                 fbase[1] = fbase[2] = fbase[3];
00497                 fbase += 4;
00498             }
00499         }
00500         else if (image.zsize == 2) {
00501             /* grayscale with alpha */
00502             fbase = ibuf->rect_float;
00503             for (x = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; x > 0; x--) {
00504                 fbase[0] = fbase[2];
00505                 fbase[1] = fbase[2] = fbase[3];
00506                 fbase += 4;
00507             }
00508         }
00509         else if (image.zsize == 3) {
00510             /* add alpha */
00511             fbase = ibuf->rect_float;
00512             for (x = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; x > 0; x--) {
00513                 fbase[0] = 1;
00514                 fbase += 4;
00515             }
00516         }
00517         
00518         if (flags & IB_rect) {
00519             IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);
00520         }
00521         
00522     }
00523 
00524     if (ibuf) {
00525         ibuf->ftype = IMAGIC;
00526         ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00527 
00528         test_endian_zbuf(ibuf);
00529 
00530         if (ibuf->rect) {
00531             IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(ibuf);
00532         }
00533     }
00534 
00535     return(ibuf);
00536 }
00537 
00538 /* static utility functions for longimagedata */
00539 
00540 static void interleaverow(unsigned char *lptr, unsigned char *cptr, int z, int n)
00541 {
00542     lptr += z;
00543     while (n--) {
00544         *lptr = *cptr++;
00545         lptr += 4;
00546     }
00547 }
00548 
00549 static void interleaverow2(float *lptr, unsigned char *cptr, int z, int n)
00550 {
00551     lptr += z;
00552     while (n--) {
00553         *lptr = ((cptr[0]<<8) | (cptr[1]<<0)) / (float)0xFFFF;      
00554         cptr += 2;
00555         lptr += 4;
00556     }
00557 }
00558 
00559 static void expandrow2(float *optr, unsigned char *iptr, int z)
00560 {
00561     unsigned short pixel, count;
00562     float pixel_f;
00563 
00564     optr += z;
00565     while (1) {
00566         pixel = (iptr[0]<<8) | (iptr[1]<<0);
00567         iptr += 2;
00568         
00569         if ( !(count = (pixel & 0x7f)) )
00570             return;
00571         if (pixel & 0x80) {
00572             while (count>=8) {
00573                 optr[0*4] = ((iptr[0]<<8) | (iptr[1]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00574                 optr[1*4] = ((iptr[2]<<8) | (iptr[3]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00575                 optr[2*4] = ((iptr[4]<<8) | (iptr[5]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00576                 optr[3*4] = ((iptr[6]<<8) | (iptr[7]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00577                 optr[4*4] = ((iptr[8]<<8) | (iptr[9]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00578                 optr[5*4] = ((iptr[10]<<8) | (iptr[11]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00579                 optr[6*4] = ((iptr[12]<<8) | (iptr[13]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00580                 optr[7*4] = ((iptr[14]<<8) | (iptr[15]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00581                 optr += 8*4;
00582                 iptr += 8*2;
00583                 count -= 8;
00584             }
00585             while (count--) {
00586                 *optr = ((iptr[0]<<8) | (iptr[1]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00587                 iptr+=2;
00588                 optr+=4;
00589             }
00590         }
00591         else {
00592             pixel_f = ((iptr[0]<<8) | (iptr[1]<<0))/(float)0xFFFF;
00593             iptr += 2;
00594 
00595             while (count>=8) {
00596                 optr[0*4] = pixel_f;
00597                 optr[1*4] = pixel_f;
00598                 optr[2*4] = pixel_f;
00599                 optr[3*4] = pixel_f;
00600                 optr[4*4] = pixel_f;
00601                 optr[5*4] = pixel_f;
00602                 optr[6*4] = pixel_f;
00603                 optr[7*4] = pixel_f;
00604                 optr += 8*4;
00605                 count -= 8;
00606             }
00607             while (count--) {
00608                 *optr = pixel_f;
00609                 optr+=4;
00610             }
00611         }
00612     }   
00613 }
00614 
00615 static void expandrow(unsigned char *optr, unsigned char *iptr, int z)
00616 {
00617     unsigned char pixel, count;
00618 
00619     optr += z;
00620     while (1) {
00621         pixel = *iptr++;
00622         if ( !(count = (pixel & 0x7f)) )
00623             return;
00624         if (pixel & 0x80) {
00625             while (count>=8) {
00626                 optr[0*4] = iptr[0];
00627                 optr[1*4] = iptr[1];
00628                 optr[2*4] = iptr[2];
00629                 optr[3*4] = iptr[3];
00630                 optr[4*4] = iptr[4];
00631                 optr[5*4] = iptr[5];
00632                 optr[6*4] = iptr[6];
00633                 optr[7*4] = iptr[7];
00634                 optr += 8*4;
00635                 iptr += 8;
00636                 count -= 8;
00637             }
00638             while (count--) {
00639                 *optr = *iptr++;
00640                 optr+=4;
00641             }
00642         }
00643         else {
00644             pixel = *iptr++;
00645             while (count>=8) {
00646                 optr[0*4] = pixel;
00647                 optr[1*4] = pixel;
00648                 optr[2*4] = pixel;
00649                 optr[3*4] = pixel;
00650                 optr[4*4] = pixel;
00651                 optr[5*4] = pixel;
00652                 optr[6*4] = pixel;
00653                 optr[7*4] = pixel;
00654                 optr += 8*4;
00655                 count -= 8;
00656             }
00657             while (count--) {
00658                 *optr = pixel;
00659                 optr+=4;
00660             }
00661         }
00662     }
00663 }
00664 
00665 /*
00666  *  output_iris -
00667  *      copy an array of ints to an iris image file.  Each int
00668  *  represents one pixel.  xsize and ysize specify the dimensions of
00669  *  the pixel array.  zsize specifies what kind of image file to
00670  *  write out.  if zsize is 1, the luminance of the pixels are
00671  *  calculated, and a sinlge channel black and white image is saved.
00672  *  If zsize is 3, an RGB image file is saved.  If zsize is 4, an
00673  *  RGBA image file is saved.
00674  *
00675  *  Added: zbuf write
00676  */
00677 
00678 static int output_iris(unsigned int *lptr, int xsize, int ysize, int zsize, const char *name, int *zptr)
00679 {
00680     FILE *outf;
00681     IMAGE *image;
00682     int tablen, y, z, pos, len = 0;
00683     unsigned int *starttab, *lengthtab;
00684     unsigned char *rlebuf;
00685     unsigned int *lumbuf;
00686     int rlebuflen, goodwrite;
00687 
00688     goodwrite = 1;
00689     outf = BLI_fopen(name, "wb");
00690     if (!outf) return 0;
00691 
00692     tablen = ysize*zsize*sizeof(int);
00693 
00694     image = (IMAGE *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(IMAGE), "iris image");
00695     starttab = (unsigned int *)MEM_mallocN(tablen, "iris starttab");
00696     lengthtab = (unsigned int *)MEM_mallocN(tablen, "iris lengthtab");
00697     rlebuflen = 1.05*xsize+10;
00698     rlebuf = (unsigned char *)MEM_mallocN(rlebuflen, "iris rlebuf");
00699     lumbuf = (unsigned int *)MEM_mallocN(xsize*sizeof(int), "iris lumbuf");
00700 
00701     memset(image, 0, sizeof(IMAGE));
00702     image->imagic = IMAGIC;
00703     image->type = RLE(1);
00704     if (zsize>1)
00705         image->dim = 3;
00706     else
00707         image->dim = 2;
00708     image->xsize = xsize;
00709     image->ysize = ysize;
00710     image->zsize = zsize;
00711     image->min = 0;
00712     image->max = 255;
00713     goodwrite *= writeheader(outf,image);
00714     fseek(outf,512+2*tablen,SEEK_SET);
00715     pos = 512+2*tablen;
00716     
00717     for (y = 0; y < ysize; y++) {
00718         for (z = 0; z < zsize; z++) {
00719             
00720             if (zsize == 1) {
00721                 lumrow((uchar *)lptr,(uchar *)lumbuf,xsize);
00722                 len = compressrow((uchar *)lumbuf,rlebuf,CHANOFFSET(z),xsize);
00723             }
00724             else {
00725                 if (z<4) {
00726                     len = compressrow((uchar *)lptr, rlebuf,CHANOFFSET(z),xsize);
00727                 }
00728                 else if (z<8 && zptr) {
00729                     len = compressrow((uchar *)zptr, rlebuf,CHANOFFSET(z-4),xsize);
00730                 }
00731             }
00732             if (len>rlebuflen) {
00733                 fprintf(stderr,"output_iris: rlebuf is too small - bad poop\n");
00734                 exit(1);
00735             }
00736             goodwrite *= fwrite(rlebuf, len, 1, outf);
00737             starttab[y+z*ysize] = pos;
00738             lengthtab[y+z*ysize] = len;
00739             pos += len;
00740         }
00741         lptr += xsize;
00742         if (zptr) zptr += xsize;
00743     }
00744 
00745     fseek(outf,512,SEEK_SET);
00746     goodwrite *= writetab(outf,starttab,tablen);
00747     goodwrite *= writetab(outf,lengthtab,tablen);
00748     MEM_freeN(image);
00749     MEM_freeN(starttab);
00750     MEM_freeN(lengthtab);
00751     MEM_freeN(rlebuf);
00752     MEM_freeN(lumbuf);
00753     fclose(outf);
00754     if (goodwrite)
00755         return 1;
00756     else {
00757         fprintf(stderr,"output_iris: not enough space for image!!\n");
00758         return 0;
00759     }
00760 }
00761 
00762 /* static utility functions for output_iris */
00763 
00764 static void lumrow(unsigned char *rgbptr, unsigned char *lumptr, int n)
00765 {
00766     lumptr += CHANOFFSET(0);
00767     while (n--) {
00768         *lumptr = ILUM(rgbptr[OFFSET_R],rgbptr[OFFSET_G],rgbptr[OFFSET_B]);
00769         lumptr += 4;
00770         rgbptr += 4;
00771     }
00772 }
00773 
00774 static int compressrow(unsigned char *lbuf, unsigned char *rlebuf, int z, int cnt)
00775 {
00776     unsigned char *iptr, *ibufend, *sptr, *optr;
00777     short todo, cc;
00778     int count;
00779 
00780     lbuf += z;
00781     iptr = lbuf;
00782     ibufend = iptr+cnt*4;
00783     optr = rlebuf;
00784 
00785     while (iptr<ibufend) {
00786         sptr = iptr;
00787         iptr += 8;
00788         while ((iptr<ibufend)&& ((iptr[-8]!=iptr[-4])||(iptr[-4]!=iptr[0])))
00789             iptr+=4;
00790         iptr -= 8;
00791         count = (iptr-sptr)/4;
00792         while (count) {
00793             todo = count>126 ? 126:count;
00794             count -= todo;
00795             *optr++ = 0x80|todo;
00796             while (todo>8) {
00797                 optr[0] = sptr[0*4];
00798                 optr[1] = sptr[1*4];
00799                 optr[2] = sptr[2*4];
00800                 optr[3] = sptr[3*4];
00801                 optr[4] = sptr[4*4];
00802                 optr[5] = sptr[5*4];
00803                 optr[6] = sptr[6*4];
00804                 optr[7] = sptr[7*4];
00805 
00806                 optr += 8;
00807                 sptr += 8*4;
00808                 todo -= 8;
00809             }
00810             while (todo--) {
00811                 *optr++ = *sptr;
00812                 sptr += 4;
00813             }
00814         }
00815         sptr = iptr;
00816         cc = *iptr;
00817         iptr += 4;
00818         while ( (iptr<ibufend) && (*iptr == cc) )
00819             iptr += 4;
00820         count = (iptr-sptr)/4;
00821         while (count) {
00822             todo = count>126 ? 126:count;
00823             count -= todo;
00824             *optr++ = todo;
00825             *optr++ = cc;
00826         }
00827     }
00828     *optr++ = 0;
00829     return optr - (unsigned char *)rlebuf;
00830 }
00831 
00832 int imb_saveiris(struct ImBuf * ibuf, const char *name, int flags)
00833 {
00834     short zsize;
00835     int ret;
00836 
00837     zsize = (ibuf->planes + 7) >> 3;
00838     if (flags & IB_zbuf &&  ibuf->zbuf != NULL) zsize = 8;
00839     
00840     IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(ibuf);
00841     test_endian_zbuf(ibuf);
00842 
00843     ret = output_iris(ibuf->rect, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, zsize, name, ibuf->zbuf);
00844 
00845     /* restore! Quite clumsy, 2 times a switch... maybe better a malloc ? */
00846     IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(ibuf);
00847     test_endian_zbuf(ibuf);
00848 
00849     return(ret);
00850 }
